001package imagingbook.violajones.resources;
002
003import java.net.URL;
004
005import imagingbook.lib.util.ResourceUtils;
006
007
008public class DataTest {
009        
010        private static final String resourcePath = ""; //"resources/";
011        
012        public static String getLocalResourcePath(String name) {
013                System.out.println("searching for " + resourcePath + name);
014                URL url = DataTest.class.getResource(resourcePath + name);
015                if (url == null) {
016                        return null;
017                }
018                else {
019                        return url.getPath();
020                        //return url.toString();
021                }
022        }
023        
024        
025        
026        public static void main(String[] args) {
027                System.out.println("Location of resources:" + DataTest.getLocalResourcePath("images/"));
028                
029                //preferred:
030                System.out.println("Location of resources (FileUtils):" + ResourceUtils.getResourcePath(Data.class, "images/"));
031                System.out.println("Location of resources (FileUtils):" + ResourceUtils.getResourcePath(Data.class, "images/bishops1.jpg"));
032                System.out.println("Location of resources (FileUtils):" + ResourceUtils.getResourcePath(Data.class, "xml/haarcascade_eye.xml"));
033                
034                {
035                        System.out.println("Resource test 1 (direct):");
036                        String filename = "images/bishops1.jpg";
037                        URL location = DataTest.class.getResource(filename);
038                        
039                        if (location == null) {
040                                System.out.println("Resource not found: " + filename);
041                        }
042                        else {
043                                System.out.println("Class found: " + location.toString());
044                        }
045                }
046
047                {
048                        System.out.println("Resource test 2 (local method):");
049                        String filename = "images/bishops1.jpg";
050                        String location = DataTest.getLocalResourcePath(filename);
051                        if (location == null) {
052                                System.out.println("Resource not found: " + filename);
053                        }
054                        else {
055                                System.out.println("Resource found: " + location.toString());
056                        }
057                }
058        }
059
060}
